subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Welsh is expected to play for the Carolina Hurricanes at Florida on Saturday night, less than 48 hours after playing for Union College in its loss to Ferris State in the N.C.A.A. semifinals.
snippet: Jeremy Welsh is expected to play for the Carolina Hurricanes at Florida on Saturday night, less than 48 hours after playing for Union College in its loss to Ferris State in the N.C.A.A. semifinals.
